titleStmt.title: A murnival of knaves, or, Whiggism plainly display'd, and (if not grown shameless) burlesqu't out of countenance
titleStmt.author: Norris, John, 1657-1711.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Satire in verse on four prominent Whigs: Lord Shaftesbury, Titus Oates, Slingsby Bethel, & Sir Thomas Player.
